root.name: The Terminator: Dawn of Fate
root.description: The Terminator: Dawn of Fate takes place before the original Terminator movie. You follow Kyle Reese and the rag tag group of human survivors in the post-apocalyptic world as they battle the machines and attempt to stop Skynet. Throughout the game you fight various models of Terminators, including the famous T-800 model. The game ends with Kyle Reese being sent back to 1984 to stop the Terminator from killing Sarah Connor, mother of the human resistance leader John Connor.
